hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #Epona's Song#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that Mido is easily confused by sick flips.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: ${12 68 79}They say that monarchy is a terrible system of governance.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found in #the Market#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #1# major item.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Hover Boots# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Arrows# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Shadow Temple# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Giant's Knife#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the Lizalfos in Dodongo's Cavern like to play in lava.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #0# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Magic Meter#.
